question: Which of the following does not describe some of the responses to and outcomes of the establishment of domestic dependent nations?

answers.text: Native peoples received no compensation for their land, as in the case of the Mission Indians in northern California.
Questions arose about the appropriateness of the arrangementâ€”especially when services or funds were not provided as promised.
Native peoples filed hundreds of civil cases against the federal government for mismanagement of service, land, or money.
The response to federal management was largely one of acceptance.
